trans-unit.source: Represents an error that occurs when a dynamic bind in the C# runtime binder is processed.
trans-unit.target: 表示在处理 C# 运行时绑定器中的动态绑定时发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions of this kind differ from <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException> in that <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException> represents a failure to bind in the sense of a usual compiler error, whereas <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException> represents a malfunctioning of the runtime binder itself.
trans-unit.target: 与不同，这种类型的异常<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException>在于<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>表示意义上的常用的编译器错误，针对绑定失败，而<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException>表示运行时联编程序本身的故障。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply" This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>会考虑当前系统的系统提供描述诸如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"此消息的错误消息的新实例的属性区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> class that has a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> 类的新实例，它包含指定的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown..
trans-unit.target: 保存有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> class that has serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> 类的新实例，它包含序列化数据。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常；如果未指定内部异常，则为空引用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> class that has a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException" /> 类的新实例，该实例具有指定的错误消息以及对导致此异常的内部异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。
